segments.text: What does your friend Jim do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is a teacher , but he makes a little money on the side by repairing cars in his free time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He can repair cares ? I cannot believe it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Believe me , he is the first-class .
segments.speaker: S2
